metadata.Title: CVE-2020-13230 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - low.
metadata.Description:
In Cacti before 1.2.11, disabling a user account does not immediately invalidate any permissions granted to that account (e.g., permission to view logs).

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-13230` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

cacti - 1.2.10+ds1-1ubuntu1+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: cacti package in esm-apps/focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.2.10+ds1-1ubuntu1+esm1').
